title: SPOILER TALK! The Lord of the Rings: Rings of Power Episode 6 - Kinda Funny Screencast
description:
Learn more about the NZXT Canvas Gaming Monitors at http://nzxt.co/KINDAFUNNY

Go to http://www.kindafunny.com/uplift to Uplift your life with an Uplift Desk!

Andy is joined by @TamoorH and @LucyJamesGames to breakdown episode 6. WHAT A GREAT EPISODE! WHAT A GREAT ENDING!

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
